#include <cstring>	//
#include <iostream> //Standard IO 
#include <cstdio>	//

#define ull long long int

using namespace std;
inline void fastRead(ull &io){
	register ull c = getchar();
	io = 0; bool flag = false;
	
	for(;((c < 48 || c > 57) && c != '-'); c = getchar()) ;
		
	if(c == '-'){
		flag = true;
		c = getchar();
	}
	
	for(; c > 47 && c < 58; c = getchar()){
		io = (io << 1 ) + (io << 3) + c - 48;
	}
	io = (flag ? -io : io);
} 

int main()
{
	ull num1 = 1, num2 = 1;
	
	while(true)
	{
		
		fastRead(num1);fastRead(num2);
		if(num1 == 0 && num2 == 0)
			break;
			
		int ctr = 0, f1 = 0, f2 = 0;
		while(num1 > 0)
		{
			f1 = num2 % 10;
			f2 = num1 % 10;
			
			ctr = ((f1 + f2) >= 10 ? ctr+1 : ctr);
				
			num1 /= 10;
			num2 /= 10;
		}
		
			
		if(ctr == 0)
			cout << "No carry operation.\n";
		else if(ctr > 1)
			cout << ctr << " carry operations.\n";
		else
			cout << "1 carry operation.\n";

	}
		

	return 0;
}
